mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer( store_id, name, phone, address, crop, area, input_date, billing_date, owe, status, uid, province, city, county, street, img, identity, remarks, role )VALUE ( #{store_id}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{crop}, #{area}, #{input_date}, #{billing_date}, #{owe}, #{status}, #{uid}, #{province}, #{city}, #{county}, #{street}, #{img}, #{identity}, #{remarks}, 0 #{role} )

INSERT INTO customer( store_id, name, phone, address, crop, area, input_date, billing_date, owe, status, uid, province, city, county, street, img, identity, remarks, role )VALUE
(#{store_id},#{item.name},#{item.phone},"","","",#{input_date},"","0","0",#{uid},"","","","","","","","0")
mapper.select: SELECT customer_id, name, phone, address, crop, area, input_date, billing_date, owe, uid, province, city, county, street, prepayment, integral, img, identity, remarks, status, role FROM customer where customer_id=#{customer_id}

SELECT c.customer_id, c.store_id, c.name, c.phone, c.address, c.crop, c.area, c.owe, c.uid, c.input_date, c.province, c.city, c.county, c.street, c.status, c.prepayment, c.integral, c.img, c.identity, c.remarks, c.role FROM customer c where c.store_id=#{store_id} and c.status!='2' and c.status!='3'
and (c.status='1' or c.status='4')
and c.owe>0
and ( POSITION(#{address} IN `province`) OR POSITION(#{address} IN `city`) OR POSITION(#{address} IN `county`) OR POSITION(#{address} IN `street`) OR POSITION(#{address} IN `address`) )
and ( POSITION(#{phone} IN `name`) OR POSITION(#{phone} IN `phone`) )
ORDER BY c.status,c.billing_date DESC
ORDER BY c.status,c.billing_date DESC
ORDER BY c.status,c.input_date DESC

mapper.select: SELECT customer_id, name, phone, address, crop, area, input_date, billing_date, owe, uid, input_date, store_id, province, city, county, street, prepayment, integral, img, role, identity, remarks FROM customer where store_id=#{store_id} and status!='3' and status!='2' and name=#{name} and phone=#{phone}

SELECT c.customer_id, c.store_id, c.name, c.phone, c.address, c.crop, c.area, c.owe, c.uid, c.input_date, c.province, c.city, c.county, c.street, c.img, c.status, c.role, c.identity, c.remarks, IFNULL( ( SELECT SUM(money) FROM order_info o WHERE o.customer_id = c.customer_id ), 0 ) AS totlemoney FROM customer c WHERE c.store_id=#{store_id} and c.status!='2' and c.status!='3' and ( POSITION(#{name} IN c.remarks) OR POSITION(#{name} IN c.name) OR POSITION(#{name} IN c.phone) OR POSITION(#{name} IN c.crop) OR POSITION(#{name} IN getPY(c.name)) ) ORDER BY c.status,c.input_date DESC

ORDER BY status,billing_date DESC

SELECT c.customer_id, c.name, c.phone, c.address, c.crop, c.area, c.owe, c.uid, c.input_date, c.province, c.city, c.county, c.street, c.prepayment, c.integral, c.img, c.role, c.identity, c.remarks, IFNULL( ( SELECT SUM(money) FROM order_info o WHERE o.customer_id = c.customer_id ), 0 ) AS totlemoney FROM customer c where c.store_id=#{store_id} and c.status!='2' and c.status!='3' AND c.owe!='0' and ( POSITION(#{name} IN c.name) OR POSITION(#{phone} IN c.name) OR POSITION(#{crop} IN c.name) ) ORDER BY c.status,c.input_date DESC

SELECT c.customer_id, c.name, c.phone, c.role, count(1) as count from ( SELECT customer_id,`name`,phone from customer WHERE store_id=#{store_id} and status='1' ORDER BY customer_id DESC ) c GROUP BY c.name HAVING count>1

SELECT c.customer_id, c.name, c.role, c.phone, count(1) as count from ( SELECT customer_id,`name`,phone from customer WHERE store_id=#{store_id} and status='1' ORDER BY customer_id DESC ) c GROUP BY c.phone HAVING count>1
